Question
========

Event A = { 2 ≤ x ≤ 4}, and B = {x|x ≥ 3}.Looking at the graph below, What then is the intersection of *A* and *B*?

![](uva-events-676-nl-graph01.png)

Answerlist
----------

* {x|x ≤ 2}
* {x|2 ≤ x ≤ 4}
* {x|3 ≤ x ≤ 4}
* {x|x ≥ 2}
* {x|x > 4}

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* {x|x ≤ 2}: Incorrect
* {x|2 ≤ x ≤ 4}: Incorrect
* {x|3 ≤ x ≤ 4}: Correct
* {x|x ≥ 2}: Incorrect
* {x|x > 4}: Incorrect
